attributes.action: To allow the people of the UK to show support for the people of Ukraine
attributes.additional_details: To address the frustration that many people of the UK have that there is little they can do to support the people of Ukraine
attributes.background: To facilitate on the earliest possible date in as many cities of the UK as possible a national march led by members of Parliament to show support for the people of the democracy of Ukraine against the invasion of their country by Vladimir Putin the self appointed leader of Russia

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

It is up to individuals, including MPs, how to publicly show their support for Ukraine.
